error.resolutionFailure: The provided record did not resolve

importError.message: Importing domain names with non-ASCII characters is not supported

selectType.title: Claim {{name}}
selectType.subtitle: Importing domain names allows them to be used as ENS names.
selectType.customizedTld: The team behind .{{tld}} have customized their ENS experience, so we're unable to help you import the name at this time

select.heading: How would you like to import your domain?

offchain.name: Offchain
offchain.description:
Your name will not have an onchain token.
This does not affect it's ability to receive transactions or be used as a primary name.
You will not be able to edit your profile from within the ENS app.

onchain.name: Onchain
onchain.description: Your name will have an onchain token.

status.enabled: DNSSEC is enabled on this domain.

disabled.heading: You'll need to visit your domain registrar to enable DNSSEC.

status.disconnected: Connect your wallet to verify ownership.

mismatching.heading: Add the DNS record below to verify your ownership of this domain.

error.onchain: The record found does not match your connected address. You can still import this name, but you will not have ownership of it.
error.offchain: The record found does not match your connected address. You can still import this name, but it will not point to your connected address and cannot be used as your primary name.

status.matching: A record matching your connected address was found.

mismatching.title: Import this domain
mismatching.subtitle: Your ownership has not been verified. You can still import this domain.

import.subtitle: <gradient>{{name}}</gradient> has been imported
import.description: This domain has been successfully imported into ENS. You can now view this name.
import.warning: Gasless DNS names do not currently appear in your "Names" list.

claim.subtitle: You are now the owner of <gradient>{{name}}</gradient>
claim.description: Your domain has been successfully claimed. You can now view and manage your name.
